episodes.title: Opus Dei: A Catholic Cult ft. Gareth Gore | Freethought Matters
episodes.description:
FFRF Co-Presidents Annie Laurie Gaylor and Dan Barker speak with Gareth Gore, a financial journalist based out of London who found himself covering a secretive right-wing cult within the Catholic church. Gore reveals how the Opus Dei cult is influencing governments around the world. 

Learn more about the Freedom From Religion Foundation at: https://ffrf.org/
